WELCOME.DESCRIPTION: This site doesn't even have a fancy name yet. It's a sandbox where I test my ideas. You can log in using a Google account, but if you're just here to see how it works, feel free to use a temporary account.
WELCOME.WHAT_DOES_IT_DO: It's a simple car logbook app, similar to many others. However, its simplicity allows me to share it  publicly on GitHub. I work on this project in my free time. Below is a roadmap of features I plan to add in the future. Tiles with ribbons will be part of my own library and will be shared across all my applications.
